content.text: Hello there! How is your day going?
It's going well! Thank you for asking. How about yours?
It's going well so far! I'm just working from home today.
Oh that's nice! What do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer. What about you?
Oh cool! I'm a fashion designer, but I can't tell my family because they are conservative.
Oh that's interesting! Why can't you tell them?
They don't really approve of it, and I don't want to disappoint them.
Oh I see. I'm sorry to hear that.
It's okay. I'm just glad I can be myself here.
That's good! What are some of your favorite things about fashion?
I love the creativity and the ability to express yourself.
That's a great way to look at it!
Thanks! What are some of your favorite things to do?
I love to cook and try new recipes. I also love to spend time with my family and dog.
Oh that's great! I love to cook too. My favorite place to eat is at my family's house.
That's so sweet! I love spending time with my family too.
